main.name: Michael Goodrum
main.description: "The happiness of the bee and the dolphin is to exist. For man it is to know that and to wonder at it." -Jacques Yves Cousteau
main.bio: Hi there ðŸ‘‹ welcome to my site. As you have probably noticed my name is Michael Goodrum. I have been a Software developer for Vlipsy since 2017. I went to school at the Georgia Institute of Technology where I studied Computer Science and graduated in 2018. I grew up in Londrina, PR in southern Brazil and moved to Atlanta to pursue my education and career in CS. Although I'm passionate about engineering and problem solving I'm also a lover of skateboarding, cycling, music and all types of artistic mediums. This site will be a place where you can find my most updated projects as well as my resume and ways to contact me.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to shoot me an email anytime! I love colaborating and getting to know new people.
